title: [6 YoE, Systems Engineer 2, Machine Learning Engineer, United States]
text:
Alex Carter
+1 (555) 555-5555 | Town, State
alex.carter.ml@gmail.com | linkedin.com/in/alexcarterml | github.com/alexcarterml

Professional Summary
Machine learning engineer with a systems engineering foundation and hands-on experience shipping computer-vision, GenAI, and data-automation solutions. Proven record of self-directed research, rigorous experimentation, and end-to-end deployment. Pursuing an M.S. in Electrical and Computer Engineering.

Education
M.S. in Electrical & Computer Engineering - (3.9 GPA), Northbridge University                         Expected May 2026
Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering, Northbridge University                                  2016 – 2020

Key Skills & Technologies
Languages: Python · C++ · SQL · Java · R
Frameworks and Libraries: PyTorch · TensorFlow · Keras · Scikit-learn · TensorRT · Hugging Face
Transformers · LangChain · OpenCV · SAM2 · YOLOv8 · ONNX
MLOps and DevOps: Git/GitHub · Docker · FastAPI · CometML
Data Engineering: pandas · NumPy · AWS (S3, SageMaker) · REST APIs
Core ML: Training & Evaluation · Hyperparameter Tuning · Cross-Validation · Model Deployment

Project Experience
Intelligent Knowledge-Retrieval (RAG) System                                                     github.com/alexcarterml/Project1
• Built a retrieval-augmented-generation pipeline with LangChain, GPT-4 APIs, and the unstructured
  library to ingest technical PDFs into FAISS vector stores.
• Designed the data system with scalability and deployment in mind, ensuring to optimize speed and
  cost.

Aim-Trainer Performance Analyzer                                                                 github.com/alexcarterml/Project2
• Architected an end-to-end CV pipeline (YOLOv8 + PaddleOCR) that achieved 98% mAP.
• Created and annotated a 2,000-image custom dataset; deployed an automatic annotation script
  using a hybrid model approach that increased throughput 10x (50 to 500 images/hr).

Professional Experience
Systems Engineer II - Ridgeway Robotics, Town, State                                                    Feb 2023 - Present
• Engineered and owned end-to-end data pipelines for 20+ *production* tests, managing the
  ingestion, validation, and processing of sensor data to ensure quality for downstream performance
  analysis and predictive modeling.
• Develop training and documentation that uphold program schedules and quality standards across
  multidisciplinary teams.

Electrical Engineer I - Harborview Instruments, Town, State                                              Mar 2022 - Feb 2023
• Developed and executed high-throughput testing protocols for electronic assemblies, analyzing test
  data to identify inefficiencies and drive procedural refinements that significantly reduced cycle times.

Quality Systems Analyst - Silverline MedTech, Town, State                                                 Aug 2020 - Mar 2022
• Automated extraction of 90,000 QC documents with Python, saving $10,000 in outsourcing costs;
  performed ANOVA/regression analysis, reducing product-defect rates and machine downtime.
